mapper.select: SELECT SMS.*, SMSC.id as c_id, SMSC.scheme_id as c_scheme_id, SMSC.issue_type_id as c_issue_type_id, SMSC.state_machine_id as c_state_machine_id, SMSC.sequence as c_sequence, SMSC.creation_date as c_creation_date, SMSC.created_by as c_created_by, SMSC.last_update_date as c_last_update_date, SMSC.last_updated_by as c_last_updated_by, SMSC.object_version_number as c_object_version_number FROM state_machine_scheme SMS LEFT JOIN state_machine_scheme_config SMSC on SMS.id = SMSC.scheme_id WHERE SMS.id = #{schemeId}

SELECT SMS.*, SMSC.id as c_id, SMSC.scheme_id as c_scheme_id, SMSC.issue_type_id as c_issue_type_id, SMSC.state_machine_id as c_state_machine_id, SMSC.sequence as c_sequence, SMSC.creation_date as c_creation_date, SMSC.created_by as c_created_by, SMSC.last_update_date as c_last_update_date, SMSC.last_updated_by as c_last_updated_by, SMSC.object_version_number as c_object_version_number FROM state_machine_scheme SMS LEFT JOIN state_machine_scheme_config SMSC on SMS.id = SMSC.scheme_id WHERE 1=1
AND SMS.organization_id = #{scheme.organizationId}
AND SMS.name LIKE concat('%',#{scheme.name},'%')
AND SMS.description LIKE concat('%',#{scheme.description},'%')
AND ( SMS.name LIKE concat('%',#{param},'%') OR SMS.description LIKE concat('%',#{param},'%') )

SELECT SMS.* FROM state_machine_scheme_config SMSC LEFT JOIN state_machine_scheme SMS ON SMSC.scheme_id = SMS.id WHERE SMSC.state_machine_id = #{stateMachineId} AND SMS.organization_id = #{organizationId}
